definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: Some surgeries and drugs could lead to the sphincter of Oddi dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 某些外科手术或药物会引起奥狄氏括约肌机能障碍。

sentences.english: The question then is how many dislocations one allows before treating the patient surgically?
sentences.chinese: 那么问题是，究竟多少次脱位才考虑外科手术干预呢？

sentences.english: CONCLUSIONS General surgery incision infection rate is higher deu to a variety of factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨引起普通外科手术切口感染相关因素及预防。

sentences.english: Objective To review the effectiveness and the outcomes of surgical treatment on patients with infective endocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价外科手术治疗感染性心内膜炎的经验和效果。

sentences.english: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
sentences.chinese: 他首创了被称为额叶切断术的外科手术。

sentences.english: And the surgery they are waiting for is to restore their virginity.
sentences.chinese: 而她们等待的外科手术将使其“重返处女之身”。

sentences.english: Surgery in a Chemically Protected Environment.
sentences.chinese: 在防化环境下施行外科手术。

sentences.english: The result has been a rapid increase in heart surgery.
sentences.chinese: 其结果就使对心脏实行外科手术的病例迅猛地在增强。

sentences.english: Surgical operation is the main means to treat GSTs.
sentences.chinese: 外科手术是胃间质瘤的主要治疗方法。

sentences.english: "This is not a medical or surgical procedure," said Kitagawa, acupuncture therapist and owner of Yojo spa.
sentences.chinese: 不属于外科手术或医学治疗的范畴。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of surgical intervention in the congenital multicystic pulmonary (CMP).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价外科手术治疗先天性多囊肺的临床效果。

sentences.english: Acupuncture anesthesia is rapidly gaining ground in surgical operations.
sentences.chinese: 针刺麻醉在外科手术上正在得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the experience of the surgical treatment of pseudo theca tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨室间隔缺损假性膜部瘤外科手术治疗经验。

sentences.english: There wasn't even time for making a surgical entry into Herring's brain.
sentences.chinese: 甚至来不及在海岭的脑部做一个进行外科手术的通道。

sentences.english: Surgery is often the best treatment option to repair an Achilles tendon rupture.
sentences.chinese: 外科手术常常是修复阿基里斯腱断裂的最佳治疗选择。

sentences.english: This is another groundbreaking, first time ever surgery.
sentences.chinese: 这是外科手术史上另一个开创性的例子。

definition: surgeon/as opposed to physician 內科醫生|内科医生[nei4 ke1 yi1 sheng1], who works primarily by administering drugs
